tql.tql:
SELECT * FROM spotify-add.add_track_to_playlist
  WHERE uris='spotify:track:7LdzfMsMSpZv7Vg6hgAbMh'
  AND user_id='salce_'
  AND playlist_id='0Pu5Nwh6KHZ3TJ5or55lIM'

/*

 * https://docs.transposit.com/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

SELECT * FROM spotify.browse_new_releases
  WHERE country='<string>'
  LIMIT 10

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://docs.transposit.com/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

SELECT * FROM spotify-browse.browse_featured_playlists
  WHERE country='US'
  AND locale='US'
  LIMIT 10

/*
 * For sample code and reference material, visit
 * https://docs.transposit.com/get-started/sql-quickstart
 */

SELECT * FROM spotify.get_my_profile
